parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables radio transmissions to be heard and seen on screen. It does not affect KBTell conversations.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''enableSentences''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableSentences]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setSpeaker]], [[disableConversation]], [[enableRadio]], [[showSubtitles]]
</value></part></template>
